channel.title: How do i start a server? and add stuff?
channel.description:
:( :| i dont get how to do this no-one will tell me, all they say is: you'll work it out in the end, oh yeah, yeah helps. :confused: so can any1 tell me step 2 step cause to be honest im not all that smart. :( :rolleyes: :P :o :confused:
tyyyz. from Emzy xx

item.title: How do i start a server? and add stuff?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

You need a client. For now, just use the moaprscape client >>>>http://www.moparisthebest.com/moparscape.html<<<<. Other servers have thier own client but some you can only play on thier server and some are sopen source which you can play on all servers.

So for just just download the moparscape clien to play on your server http://www.moparisthebest.com/moparscape.html

Read full topic

item.source: How do i start a server? and add stuff?

item.title: How do i start a server? and add stuff?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

OK… You need a source, Testscape for example. You will need hamachi or no-ip, either one is better although no-ip is more efficient.
Use the tutorials on the Tutorials section on this site. OK… to complile your server compy this into your compiler (compiler is inside the testscape source folder)

@echo off COLOR 08 title YOURSERVERNAME "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.5.0_06\bin\java.exe" server pause

Once you have compiled your server you can now run it. There should be a run.bat inside your testscape source folder.

You will also need a client to play your server on. I would suggest moparscape client as it is the best.
http://www.moparisthebest.com/moparscape.html <<<moparscape client download

OK to add monster, open up your autospawn.cfg

You will see something like this “something like this” because i use the pimpscape source) :

[code]//------NpcID—CoordX–CoordY–Height–RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption

spawn = 3494 2752 3473 0 3240 3426 3246 3431 2 flambeed //talker at gopk
spawn = 54 3244 3429 0 3240 3426 3246 3431 2 Black Dragon
spawn = 43 0 0 0 2372 5062 2422 5117 1 sheep
spawn = 1174 3515 3480 0 2372 5062 2422 5117 1 fishing spot
spawn = 2740 2380 5075 0 2372 5062 2422 5117 1 tok-xil
spawn = 2740 2420 5113 0 2372 5062 2422 5117 1 tok-xil
spawn = 2740 2416 5105 0 2372 5062 2422 5117 1 tok-xil
spawn = 2740 2402 5094 0 2372 5062 2422 5117 1 tok-xil
spawn = 2740 2400 5077 0 2372 5062 2422 5117 1 tok-xil
spawn = 2740 2721 3472 0 2372 5062 2422 5117 1 tok-xil
spawn = 213 3386 9787 0 3386 9787 3386 9787 1 random event guy
spawn = 188 3380 9760 0 3380 9760 3380 9760 1 random event monk 1
spawn = 189 3368 9770 0 3368 9770 3368 9770 1 random event monk 2
spawn = 189 3382 9752 0 3382 9752 3382 9752 1 random event monk 3
spawn = 190 3346 9747 0 3346 9747 3346 9747 1 random event monk 4
spawn = 190 3371 9745 0 3371 9745 3371 9745 1 random event monk 5
spawn = 166 2353 3165 0 2353 2165 2353 2165 1 gnome banker
spawn = 132 2731 9170 javascript:void(0);
Roll Eyes1 2744 9150 2693 9213 1 monkey
spawn = 3351 2723 3492 0 3250 3423 3250 3423 2 starter dude //cammy
spawn = 3351 3251 3423 0 3250 3423 3250 3423 2 starter dude//varrock
spawn = 1201 3267 3435 0 3267 3435 3267 3435 2 BD dude 1
spawn = 1199 3269 3435 0 3269 3435 3269 3435 2 BD dude 2[/code]

but much longer.

The first number is the monster’s ID and the second and third are the co-ords of the monster. The 5th to 8th RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2 is the range that the monster can walk in.

Please pm me if you want me to explain anything else or you want me to explain this out fully. If you do pm me ill send you pics on how to set up and use hamachi.

Read full topic
